about_the_game:
In Eastern Asia, a hidden treasure awaits all Chefs brave enough to learn about exotic ingredients and different recipes: a centuries-old culinary tradition!
With Chef: Eastern Asian Cuisine, you will finally explore the unique tastes and flavors of China, Japan, and Korea! This DLC further expands the game selection of Asian ingredients, recipes, and cooking templates, which will allow you to find new ways to milk customers for money!

Contents

  • 7 unique Templates, allowing you to create new custom recipes: Sushi, Ramen, Steamed Bun, Rice Bowl, Rice Balls, Stir-Fry Meat, and Stir-Fry Seafood.
  • 28 tasty pre-made Recipes to inspire you.
  • 15 additional Ingredients, bringing the unique Eastern Asian flavor to your kitchen.
  • 54 exquisite Decorations, with several variants, to make your place more beautiful than ever.
  • 32 shiny new customizations for Walls and Floors.

With Chef: Eastern Asian Cuisine, you will finally explore the unique tastes and flavors of China, Japan, and Korea! This DLC further expands the game selection of Asian ingredients, recipes, and cooking templates, which will allow you to find new ways to milk customers for money!

name: Chef: Eastern Asian Cuisine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP1+ (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+ @ 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 3000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630, AMD Radeon HD6570, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960, AMD Radeon R9 295, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 MB available space

short_description: Chef: Eastern Asian Cuisine will let you explore the tastes and flavors of China, Japan, and Korea! With new Recipes, Templates, Ingredients, and Decorations your restaurant will be better than ever!
supported_languages: English, Italian, Russian, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Turkish, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
